Class DwWorld

  • java.lang.Object
    • World
      • com.thomasdiewald.liquidfun.java.DwWorld

  • public class DwWorld
extends World
    Main box2d world.

    https://github.com/jbox2d/jbox2d/blob/master/jbox2d-library/src/main/java/org/jbox2d/dynamics/World.java
    https://google.github.io/liquidfun/Programmers-Guide/html/md__chapter11__particles.html
    Author:
    Thomas Diewald

      • update

        public void update()

      • update

        public void update(float timestep,
                   int iter_velocity,
                   int iter_position)
        Take a time step. This performs collision detection, integration, and constraint solution.
        Parameters:
        timeStep - the amount of time to simulate, this should not vary.
        velocityIterations - for the velocity constraint solver.
        positionIterations - for the position constraint solver.

        public void createZombieBounds()
